content:
We are having our monthly FSH meeting Thursday August 13 at 9 am Eastern US time.
click here to join
Agenda:

  • Update on FSH 1.0 release
  • Overview of Connectathon 25 FHIR Shorthand track
  • New syntax for parameterized macros
  • Improving integration of SUSHI in IG Publisher
    Hope to virtually see you tomorrow!
For those who couldn't attend, the minutes and recording can be found here https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+Shorthand+Minutes+2020-08-13
I had a conflicting appointment, apologies I could not join. I don't quite grasp the "pages" challenge, so i can't comment if there is anything that could be done in the template, for example
